scripts.build-dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development sequelize-cli db:drop && cross-env NODE_ENV=development sequelize-cli db:create && cross-env NODE_ENV=development sequelize-cli db:migrate && cross-env NODE_ENV=development sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.build-prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production sequelize-cli db:drop && cross-env NODE_ENV=production sequelize-cli db:create && cross-env NODE_ENV=production sequelize-cli db:migrate && cross-env NODE_ENV=production sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.test-dev: npm run build-dev && node -e "console.clear()" && (run-p start-dev test-dev-start)
scripts.test-dev-start: start cmd /k "cd /d %cd% && postman login --with-api-key PMAK-64532e8e033675760a6c5588-9b632c51c507189c5912b56981fbc6dcc1 && postman collection run 24524579-491ea67e-9b9a-4042-aeed-94b78d5602eb
